meanings.definition: The quality or state of being venturous.
meanings.sent1: Her venturousnesses in trying new foods always amazed her friends.
meanings.sent2: His venturousnesses in exploring unknown territories led to many exciting discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The venturousnesses of the squirrel trying to reach the bird feeder provided entertainment for the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The venturousnesses of the young entrepreneur's spirit soared higher than the tallest mountain.
meanings.sent5: The venturousnesses of the astronaut embarking on a space mission inspired generations to dream big.

meanings.definition: The act or practice of being venturous.
meanings.sent1: The venturousnesses of skydiving brought an adrenaline rush like no other.
meanings.sent2: His venturousnesses in starting his own business paid off with great success.
meanings.sent3: The venturousnesses of trying to juggle while riding a unicycle made for a hilarious circus act.
meanings.sent4: Her venturousnesses in navigating through the busy city streets were like a skilled dancer weaving through a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The venturousnesses of the explorer facing the roaring rapids were captured in a breathtaking photograph.
